languages.text: "Владайм больше не Наместник Футфола... Не то чтобы мне жаль старого проныру, но все же он умел держать станцию под контролем. Справится ли его смена со столь норовистым хозяйством?"

"Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"
languages.original_text: "Владайм больше не Наместник Футфола... Не то чтобы мне жаль старого проныру, но все же он умел держать станцию под контролем. Справится ли его смена со столь норовистым хозяйством?"

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"

"Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"

"Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"

"Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"

languages.text: “弗拉迪姆已经不再是落脚港的君主……我倒不是同情那条老黄鼠狼，但他确实知道该如何管好那座星站。如今接替他的人，真的能管理好这么一个不守规矩的地方吗？”
languages.original_text: "Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"

traits.locale_text: “弗拉迪姆已经不再是落脚港的君主……我倒不是同情那条老黄鼠狼，但他确实知道该如何管好那座星站。如今接替他的人，真的能管理好这么一个不守规矩的地方吗？”

languages.text: « Vladaym n'est plus responsable de Castel... Non pas que je plaigne cette vieille fouine, mais il faut quand même admettre qu'il tenait cette station d'une main de fer. Je me demande si sa remplaçante réussira à tenir en laisse une maison aussi turbulente... »
languages.original_text: "Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"

traits.locale_text: « Vladaym n'est plus responsable de Castel... Non pas que je plaigne cette vieille fouine, mais il faut quand même admettre qu'il tenait cette station d'une main de fer. Je me demande si sa remplaçante réussira à tenir en laisse une maison aussi turbulente... »

languages.text: «Vladaym ya no es el Señor de Paso... No es que lo sienta por la vieja comadreja, pero sabía controlar la estación. ¿Podrá su sustituta dirigir un lugar tan inestable?».
languages.original_text: "Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"

traits.locale_text: «Vladaym ya no es el Señor de Paso... No es que lo sienta por la vieja comadreja, pero sabía controlar la estación. ¿Podrá su sustituta dirigir un lugar tan inestable?».

languages.text: 「ヴラダイムはもうフットフォールのリージュじゃない…老いぼれタヌキを哀れむわけじゃないけど、ステーションの管理方法には精通してた。あんなに荒っぽい家をアイツの代わりが運営できるのかい？」
languages.original_text: "Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴラダイムはもうフットフォールのリージュじゃない…老いぼれタヌキを哀れむわけじゃないけど、ステーションの管理方法には精通してた。あんなに荒っぽい家をアイツの代わりが運営できるのかい？」

languages.text: "Vladaym ist nicht länger Lehnsherr von Footfall ... Nicht, dass ich Mitleid mit dem alten Wiesel hätte, doch er wusste, wie man die Station unter Kontrolle hält. Wird sein Ersatz in der Lage sein, ein solch ungestümes Haus zu bändigen?"
languages.original_text: "Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym ist nicht länger Lehnsherr von Footfall ... Nicht, dass ich Mitleid mit dem alten Wiesel hätte, doch er wusste, wie man die Station unter Kontrolle hält. Wird sein Ersatz in der Lage sein, ein solch ungestümes Haus zu bändigen?"

languages.original_text: "Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"

languages.text: "Vladaym artık Binliman Emîri değil. O yaşlı adiye üzülmesem de istasyonu kontrol altında tutmasını biliyordu. Halefi, bu itaatsiz memleketi idare edebilecek mi?"
languages.original_text: "Vladaym is no longer Liege of Footfall... Not that I feel sorry for the old weasel, but he did know how to keep the station under control. Will his replacement be able to handle such an unruly house?"

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym artık Binliman Emîri değil. O yaşlı pisliğe üzülmüyorum ama istasyonu nasıl kontrol altında tutacağını biliyordu. Yerine geçen kişi bu itaatsiz haneyi idare edebilecek mi?"
